name: deep-thoughts
description: Socal media discussion website created using web development tools relating to the MERN stack - MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS and npm packages and query languages from GraphQL and Apollo server.

scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
